item.title: Version 5.0.1
item.description:
Launching IHOP7 with refreshed visuals
New Archive: lectures, posters, competitions,Tahseen Awards, workshops, courses, certificates
Speakers & Moderators archives with quick bios
Committees directory with member bios and search
Favorites & smoother navigation
Performance and stability improvements
Faster loading for archives
Improved search behavior (partial & case-insensitive)
Minor UI polish and bug fixes
